name: One Side Knight
description:
One Side Knight is a 2D top down game with the simple objective of eliminating enemies ... but this is not as easy as you might think ... Mainly because of the issue that you can only attack from one side.
This is my second microgame.
Used Assets:
Music:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/action-rpg-music-free-85434
Player:https://uilleaggodwin.itch.io/roguelike-dungeon-asset-bundle
Enemie:https://superdark.itch.io/16x16-free-npc-pack
Map:https://raou.itch.io/free-dungeon-mini-tileset
Controls:
Space: Attack
W, A, S, D: Movement
Made With Unity.
